about_the_game: Our demo has all of the features of the main title, except there is only LAN multiplayer and the match durations are limited to 5:00 minutes.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains strong violence, blood, gore, dismemberment, decapitation, gun and sword violence, exploding guts, and light cursing.

detailed_description: Our demo has all of the features of the main title, except there is only LAN multiplayer and the match durations are limited to 5:00 minutes.
name: Brutal Ball Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit only)
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with shader model 3.0 support.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or better
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 8000 series or higher graphics card
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
